block.p: Asia's fast-growing Internet company, Pacific Century CyberWorks of Hong Kong, will forge a business alliance with Sony PCL to construct a studio in Tokyo and bring its Network of the World service, known as NOW, to Japan by mid-2001. Pacific Century will procure audiovisual hardware and technical support from Sony PCL, a subsidiary of the Sony Corporation, as well as staffing assistance for the studio. NOW delivers synchronized text and video to television and Web viewers.
